text: Mucha'i ka’le, ‘he amara raba! Tumiye'i phira'a'una arau tara paraisadabargaka parthira jiranata saundarya arau dhana-sampada pradana karaicha, he amara raba! Sihamte iyara dbaraa'i manuhaka tomara pathara paraa bhrasta karae. He amara raba! Sihamtara sampada binasta karaa, arau sihamtara hrdaya kathina karai diya, phalata sihamte yantranadayaka sasti pratyaksa nakaraa laike imana posana nakaraiba’
